aboutSection.title: About AI Trivia Master
aboutSection.intro: Welcome to AI Trivia Master! This interactive game tests your knowledge across various categories or your own custom topics. Questions, answers, and explanations are dynamically generated by AI, offering a unique experience every time.
aboutSection.featureAI: AI-Generated Questions: Fresh trivia on any topic.
aboutSection.featureCategories: Flexible Categories: Choose predefined or enter custom topics.
aboutSection.featureDifficulty: Adaptive Difficulty: Questions adjust to your skill level.
aboutSection.featureBilingual: Bilingual Support: Play and learn in English or Spanish.
aboutSection.feedbackEncouragement: We value your input! Use the form below for suggestions or feedback.
